sentences.sContent: Your headaches are due to stress.
sentences.sCn: 你的头痛是压力造成的。

sentences.sContent: Janet’s been under a lot of stress since her mother’s illness.
sentences.sCn: 珍妮特自从母亲生病以来承受了很大的压力。

sentences.sContent: all the stresses of public life
A lot of illnesses are stress-related.
...how about what one Hunter College professor reportedly did recently for her final exam: She encouraged the class not to stress or even study...
...Take-homes require thoughtful engagement which can lead to longer term stress as there is never a moment when the time is up...
...there are higher levels of stress hormones in their bodies which can decrease immune function...
...Crying in response to stress and conflict in the home...
...making process has been undermined by stress or peer pressure...
...People in supportive relationships may handle stress better...
...What does the man say about an element of stress in his job...
...I do think that an element of stress is a good thing...
...Would you consider changing your job because of the high stress factor...

synos.tran: 压力；强调；紧张；重要性；重读
强调；使紧张；加压力于；用重音读

phrases.pCn: 温度应力，温差应力；热应力
n. 动态应力，动力应力

remMethod.val: s ＋ tress(看作dress， 穿衣) → 穿衣强调个人风格 → 强调

trans.tranOther: continuous feelings of worry about your work or personal life, that prevent you from relaxing
